tool_description: Compare 14-day weather forecasts effortlessly across multiple cities. Access accurate and real-time weather data for informed decision-making in travel, events, and more. Simplify integration with our flexible API.
name: Weather Comparison API
title: Weather Comparison API

api_list.name: Locations Weather Updates
api_list.description: Compare weather updates for different locations
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://weather-comparison-api.p.rapidapi.com/compare/London,Paris,New%20York"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "weather-comparison-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://weather-comparison-api.p.rapidapi.com/compare/{cities}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "weather-comparison-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
